June 15, 2014 D Regionalmusiktag - BMVTGOG, SO (Marschmusik)
Regionalmusiktag - BMVTGOG, SO (Marschmusik) 0 March Contest
regionalmusiktag-bmvtgog-so-marschmusik
Lostorf, SO, Switzerland > held on June 14th & 15th
totally 37 participating Bands (mixed ranking Brass/Wind; on Sunday = marked 2)
May 23, 2014, 7:35 p.m. Dec. 4, 2014, 8:15 p.m.
1 Brass Band Matzendorf Marcel Bossert March: Vivat Lucerna
2 Musikgesellschaft Konkordia Aedermannsdorf Bernhard Wüthrich March: Marche du Dragon
3 MG Konkordia Mümliswil Marco Nussbaumer March: Rumisberger Marsch
4 Musikgesellschaft Winznau Reimar Walthert March: Gruss an Thüringen
6 Brass Band Wolfwil Emerita Blum-Duss March: Langnauer Marsch
9 Brass Band Kappel Oliver Waldmann March: Slaidburn
11 MV Gretzenbach Arno Müller
11 MV Herbetswil Fabian Bloch March: Viva Arogno
11 Vereinigte Brass Band MGN / BBSM Hans Kurth March: Oberaargauer Kegler-Marsch
